siteMetadata.title: Complete Intro to React
siteMetadata.subtitle: v6
siteMetadata.description: Brian Holt breaks down React into the most low level principles so that you can understand your whole stack, from front to back

frontmatter.title: Introduction
frontmatter.description: Brian Holt introduces you to himself, the Complete Intro to React version 6, and what you can expect to learn

frontmatter.title: Pure React
frontmatter.description: Brian teaches React without any frills: just you, some JavaScript, and the browser. No build step.
